column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) weighted in T2, revealing the head of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section n°122 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1535.8887 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 7809.9609 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 349.3652 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 192.4805 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1720.4590 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 328.2715 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 56.6895 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1110.0586 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 44.8242 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 268.9453 mm³.
